title: Villa with Stunning Sea Views for Sale in Costa de la Calma
description: Stunning Villa with Panoramic Sea Views in a Peaceful yet Central Location. Nestled in a tranquil residential area just a short five-minute stroll from the sea, this exceptional villa offers breathtaking panoramic views and an ideal southern exposure for all-day sun on the spacious terraces.

Set on a generous plot of approximately 775 m², the property features a total living area of around 231 m² distributed over two levels. The main residence occupies the upper floor, while the lower level hosts a fully independent guest apartment.

The upper level welcomes you with a bright and airy living-dining area, seamlessly connected to an open-plan, fully equipped kitchen. Also on this floor are a guest WC and a spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom — all offering spectacular sea views from every angle. An external staircase leads to the lower-level guest apartment, which enjoys its own private entrance. This space includes three bedrooms, a bathroom, a cozy living room, a kitchen, and a separate utility room.

The outdoor area is a highlight, featuring a beautiful swimming pool overlooking the sea, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. Additional features include oil-fired central heating, air conditioning (hot/cold) in the main bedrooms, double-glazed PVC windows, an alarm system, fitted wardrobes, exposed wooden beams, terracotta tiles, and parquet flooring. The property also offers two outdoor parking spaces.
This villa combines comfort, privacy, and stunning views in an unbeatable location — perfect as a family home or holiday retreat.
location_desc: Costa de la Calma is a quiet costal area located very near to Santa Ponsa. It is also within close distance to the luxury marina of Puerto Adriano. The area offers a combination of breathtaking landscapes and international social hub life without forgetting the beautiful beaches and several golf courses.

location_desc: Campos is a traditional town 42 km southeast of Palma. The town’s quiet streets, weekly markets and historic churches create an authentic Mallorcan experience. Beaches and golf resorts are nearby, with Palma’s urban attractions just a short drive away.

title: New Build Project: Stylish Sea View Villa for Sale in Costa d'en Blanes
description: Luxury Villa with Panoramic Bay Views – Living at the Highest Level

This exceptional villa captivates with its light-filled, spacious interiors and breathtaking panoramic views over the bay and the open sea – completely unobstructed and visible from every angle. Upon entering the upper living level, you're welcomed by an elegant open-plan layout that seamlessly connects the living area, dining space, and modern designer kitchen. Expansive floor-to-ceiling windows open onto a generous terrace, creating a harmonious flow between indoor and outdoor living.
Also located on this level is the exclusive master suite, featuring a walk-in wardrobe, a luxurious en-suite bathroom, and direct access to the terrace – all with stunning sea views.

The lower level is designed with family and guests in mind, offering three stylish en-suite bedrooms, each with access to the sunny south-facing terrace and spectacular views – perfect for hosting or relaxing in privacy.

The basement level provides a host of high-end amenities: a private wine cellar, home cinema, fully equipped gym, laundry room, and a spacious garage for up to three vehicles. All levels of the villa are connected by an elevator, ensuring maximum comfort and accessibility.
location_desc: Costa d’en Blanes is an exclusive hillside residential area just 10 km from Palma. Overlooking the Mediterranean and the luxury marina of Puerto Portals, it offers privacy, prestige, and proximity to international schools and golf courses. Beaches, restaurants, and shopping are all nearby, while the elevated setting ensures panoramic views and a tranquil atmosphere.

title: New Build Project: Luxury Sea View Villa for Sale in Costa d'en Blanes
description: Modern Luxury Villa with Sea Views in Costa d’en Blanes – Prime Location on Mallorca’s Southwest Coast

This exceptional new-build villa is being constructed in one of Mallorca’s most sought-after areas. Perched above the coastline in Costa d’en Blanes, it offers breathtaking panoramic sea views from nearly every room.

The open-plan living area is flooded with natural light and flows seamlessly onto a spacious terrace featuring a stylish chill-out lounge and a private infinity pool – the perfect setting to relax or entertain while enjoying the stunning surroundings.
A high-end kitchen with integrated dining area connects directly to the outdoor spaces, creating a smooth indoor-outdoor living experience.
Upstairs, the luxurious master suite boasts a walk-in wardrobe, en-suite bathroom, and spectacular views. Three additional bedrooms provide ample space for family and guests.
The lower level completes this exclusive offering with a fully equipped gym, wine cellar, private cinema, and a double garage – combining comfort, style, and functionality.
location_desc: Costa d’en Blanes is an exclusive hillside residential area just 10 km from Palma. Overlooking the Mediterranean and the luxury marina of Puerto Portals, it offers privacy, prestige, and proximity to international schools and golf courses. Beaches, restaurants, and shopping are all nearby, while the elevated setting ensures panoramic views and a tranquil atmosphere.

On the ground floor there is a hallway, guest toilet, kitchen/pantry, dining room, living room, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a dressing room, a large covered terrace with access to the garden and pool area.
Up to the first floor there is an additional living area, 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 4 dressing rooms and 2 terraces.
In the basement there is another bedroom, bathroom and dressing room. There is also an indoor swimming pool, gym, spa, cinema, laundry room, guest toilet, technical room and parking.

In terms of materials, a limestone cladding “Marbella limestone” type, in an off-white / beige tone, is proposed for the façades. For the flooring, the first option is to have natural stone 80x80 format on the ground floor and natural oak wood on the first floor, with the possibility of studying other alternatives such as porcelain tiles.
